name: RoboHope
description:
Message

This is my second game jam and I'm pretty happy with the results (having released a more 'complete' experience than before). The art is more functional than pretty, but it does get the point across. I also feel like the game is quite hard until you understand the right actions to perform. Do let me know how you enjoy it and any points of criticism are welcome. Hope you enjoy it!

Description

You play as a human sent to help out some robotic friends that have got themselves into a bit of trouble. Your robotic friends will collect, build and defend the factories while your goal is to help them with those tasks and retrieve the crystals needed to fuel the rocket you'll need to escape.

The enemy will not stop harassing you, so take advantage of your friends capabilities by interacting with the factories to supply and decide what they build. You can also build upgrades for yourself and your friends to achieve your goal quicker.

Upon getting the required materials, get to a factory quick to build that rocket and blast off outta there!

Controls

W/A/S/D - Move
Left Mouse - Shoot / Mine
Scroll - Zoom In / Out
Q - Switch between shooting and mining
E - Interact when near a factory
H - Show Help
